overview:
Linda is an Organizational Architect.

She specializes as a Management / Technology / Research Consultant providing effective organizational management, systems engineering and process architecture, and is a master program manager, who holds a Bachelor of Science Degree in Resource Development, and Chemistry from the University of Rhode Island. She has had a twenty seven year professional career working for IBM, Aspen Technology, Ziff-Davis Publishing, Polaroid, DuPont, and the National Marine Fisheries Service

A passionate leader, Linda formed Strategy and Design Solutions, LLC in 2009 to offer specialty consulting, research services, and product incubation for innovators and entrepreneurs seeking to operationalize there companies. Her company serves clients with a personal and professional touch creating forward progress toward the goals they set.

Linda was trained in management science and system engineering at IBM where she worked for both the Software Group and Global Business Services. She has a track record for organizational design and development, change management, business system architecture and deployments, and applied research.
